filmography.title: A Free Soul
filmography.role_description: A charming but ruthless gangster whose romance with a defense attorney's daughter scandalizes her family and launches Gable's career.
filmography.plot: A hard-drinking lawyer successfully defends a gangster on a murder charge, only to find his daughter falling for the criminal.

filmography.title: Night Nurse
filmography.role_description: A menacing, cold-blooded chauffeur who conspires to starve two children to death to steal their trust fund.
filmography.plot: A live-in nurse discovers a plot by a mother's boyfriend to starve her two children to death.

filmography.title: Possessed
filmography.role_description: A wealthy lawyer who begins an illicit affair with a factory worker determined to rise in society, threatening his political ambitions.
filmography.plot: A factory worker looking for a better life becomes the mistress of a wealthy lawyer running for governor.

filmography.title: Red Dust
filmography.role_description: A rugged rubber plantation owner in Indochina caught between a refined, married woman and a brassy prostitute.
filmography.plot: On a rubber plantation in Indochina, the overseer falls for the wife of a new employee, while also contending with a prostitute on the run.

filmography.title: Dancing Lady
filmography.role_description: A demanding Broadway dance director who pushes a former burlesque performer to become a star.
filmography.plot: A burlesque dancer is bailed out of jail by a rich playboy and gets a shot at Broadway stardom under a tough director.

filmography.title: It Happened One Night
filmography.role_description: A cynical, out-of-work newspaper reporter who agrees to help a runaway heiress get to New York in exchange for an exclusive story.
filmography.plot: A renegade reporter trails a runaway heiress for a big story, but the two of them begin to fall in love during a bus ride.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actor; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Manhattan Melodrama
filmography.role_description: A charismatic gambler and racketeer who remains loyal to his childhood friend, now a district attorney, even as he faces the electric chair.
filmography.plot: Childhood friends grow up on opposite sides of the law: one a DA, the other a gangster.

filmography.title: The Call of the Wild
filmography.role_description: A prospector in the Yukon who rescues a St. Bernard mix named Buck and searches for gold while falling for a married woman.
filmography.plot: A prospector sets out for the Klondike Gold Rush with a dog he rescued from an abusive owner.

filmography.title: China Seas
filmography.role_description: A gruff steamship captain carrying a fortune in gold who must deal with typhoons, pirates, and his jealousy-inducing mistress.
filmography.plot: The captain of a steamer traveling from Hong Kong to Singapore risks his life and ship to protect a gold shipment from pirates.

filmography.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
filmography.role_description: The master's mate on the HMS Bounty who leads a mutiny against the tyrannical Captain Bligh to save the crew from abuse.
filmography.plot: A tyrannical ship captain abuses his crew to the point of mutiny, led by his first mate.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Wife vs. Secretary
filmography.role_description: A publishing executive whose close professional relationship with his secretary sparks jealousy in his wife.
filmography.plot: A publisher's wife begins to suspect that his relationship with his secretary goes beyond business.

filmography.title: San Francisco
filmography.role_description: A roguish Barbary Coast saloon keeper who vies for the love of an opera singer against a priest, culminating in the 1906 earthquake.
filmography.plot: A saloon keeper and a priest try to guide the destiny of a beautiful singer in 1906 San Francisco.

filmography.title: Saratoga
filmography.role_description: A charismatic bookie who wins the deed to a horse breeding farm and clashes with the late owner's daughter.
filmography.plot: A bookie and the daughter of a horse breeder clash over the family farm and a racehorse.

filmography.title: Test Pilot
filmography.role_description: A reckless and brilliant test pilot who marries a Kansas farm girl, struggling to balance his dangerous job with domestic life.
filmography.plot: A daredevil test pilot marries a girl he meets on a forced landing, but his job puts a strain on their relationship.

filmography.title: Idiot's Delight
filmography.role_description: A small-time hoofer and impresario stranded in an Alpine hotel on the eve of WWII, who encounters a 'Russian' countess he thinks he knows.
filmography.plot: A group of disparate travelers are stranded at a Swiss hotel as World War II begins.

filmography.title: Gone with the Wind
filmography.role_description: A dashing, cynical blockade runner who falls for the headstrong Scarlett O'Hara amidst the collapse of the Old South.
filmography.plot: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; Oscar: Win – Best Picture

filmography.title: Strange Cargo
filmography.role_description: A tough convict who escapes a penal colony in French Guiana, accompanied by a woman of ill repute and a mysterious Christ-like figure.
filmography.plot: Prisoners escape from Devil's Island and are influenced by a mysterious stranger who may be divine.

filmography.title: Boom Town
filmography.role_description: A rugged wildcatter who strikes it rich in the oil fields, partnering and feuding with his best friend over business and women.
filmography.plot: Two friends strike oil in Texas, but their partnership is threatened by their rivalry over a woman and business success.

filmography.title: Honky Tonk
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking con man who takes over a Western town and marries a judge's daughter, struggling to go straight.
filmography.plot: A con man takes over a town, but finds his plans complicated when he falls for the local judge's daughter.

filmography.title: Somewhere I'll Find You
filmography.role_description: A war correspondent who, along with his brother, covers the outbreak of WWII in the Pacific while vying for the same woman.
filmography.plot: Two brothers who are war correspondents cover the war in the Pacific and fall for the same girl.

filmography.title: Adventure
filmography.role_description: A rough-and-tumble merchant marine sailor who marries a librarian on a whim, sparking a tempestuous relationship.
filmography.plot: A merchant marine sailor marries a librarian, but his wandering spirit threatens their marriage.

filmography.title: The Hucksters
filmography.role_description: A cynical radio advertising executive who battles a tyrannical soap tycoon to maintain his integrity.
filmography.plot: A radio executive tries to balance his integrity with the demands of a tyrannical client.

filmography.title: Command Decision
filmography.role_description: A pragmatic Air Force general faced with the heavy burden of sending his men on a deadly but necessary bombing mission over Germany.
filmography.plot: A general must make the difficult decision to send his bomber crews on a dangerous mission to destroy German jet fighter plants.

filmography.title: Across the Wide Missouri
filmography.role_description: A beaver trapper in the 1830s Rockies who marries a Blackfoot woman to gain access to her tribe's land, but genuinely falls in love.
filmography.plot: A trapper marries a Native American woman to gain entry into her tribe's lands, but eventually falls in love with her.

filmography.title: Mogambo
filmography.role_description: A big-game hunter in Kenya who becomes entangled in a love triangle with a sophisticated married woman and a brassy showgirl.
filmography.plot: On a Kenyan safari, a white hunter finds himself torn between a sultry showgirl and a prim, married anthropologist.

filmography.title: Run Silent, Run Deep
filmography.role_description: A submarine commander obsessed with destroying the Japanese destroyer that sank his previous ship, clashing with his executive officer.
filmography.plot: A submarine captain is determined to sink the Japanese destroyer that sank his previous ship, despite the doubts of his crew.

filmography.title: Teacher's Pet
filmography.role_description: A gruff, self-educated newspaper editor who poses as a student in a journalism class to woo the instructor.
filmography.plot: A hard-nosed newspaper editor falls for a journalism teacher while pretending to be a student in her class.

filmography.title: The Misfits
filmography.role_description: An aging cowboy struggling to maintain his independent way of life while falling for a fragile divorcée; Gable's final film role.
filmography.plot: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who struggles to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle in early-sixties Nevada.
